text.__SUMMARY__:
Dendrobium falconeri, commonly known as 串珠石斛 (chuan zhu shi hu), is a species of orchid native to Asia.
It is native to southern China (Hunan, Yunnan), Taiwan, the Eastern Himalayas (Bhutan), Northeastern India (Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, and Sikkim), and northern Indochina (Myanmar, Thailand, Vietnam).
